title: All Time Low Lift Off With â€˜Everyoneâ€™s Talking!â€™: Stream ItÂ Now
summary: "Everyoneâ€™s Talking!" is the 10th full-length studio effort from the Maryland quartet.
body: All Time Low notch up double digits with Everyoneâ€™s Talking!, which arrives today, Oct. 17, through the alternative rock veteransâ€™ own label Basement Noise Records. Everyoneâ€™s Talking! is the 10 th full-length studio LP from the Maryland quartet, comprising Alex Gaskarth, Jack Barakat, Rian Dawson and Zack Merrick, and features the previously-released â€œSugar,â€ a collaboration with Grammy Award winning singer and songwriter JoJo, and the first single â€œSuckerpunch.â€ All Time Low have landed 10 titles on the Billboard 200 chart, including five top 10 appearances. All told, the rockers have racked up 5 billion career streams, and led Billboard â€™s Alternative Airplay chart with â€œSleepwalkingâ€ (in 2023) and â€œMonsters,â€ featuring blackbear , the latter logging 18 weeks at the summit in 2020-21. All Time Low has been roadtesting new material on their 30-plus-date Everyone’s Talking! Tour , which kicked off earlier this month and endured a hiccup earlier this week when the band skipped shows at Red Rocks and Seattle when frontman Gaskarth was sidelined with a throat infection. Gaskarth has been cleared to continue on the tour, reads a statement (though heâ€™s being â€œextremely mindful oâ€¦

title: Tame Impala Drops â€˜Deadbeatâ€™ Album: Stream ItÂ Now
summary: "Deadbeat" is the Australian production maestroâ€™s first Tame Impala album in five years.
body: Kevin Parker winds back the clock, tunes up the dancefloor and reminds us to get our arms out wide (or up high) on Deadbeat , Tame Impala â€™s fifth and latest full-length studio album. Dropping at midnight, Oct. 17, Deadbeat is the production maestroâ€™s first Tame Impala album in five years, and the first through the Sony Music network, by way of a new deal with Columbia Records . As previously reported, Deadbeat is inspired by the â€œbush doofâ€ culture of Parkerâ€™s native Western Australia rave scene, a moment in time impressively captured on its first release, â€œEnd of Summerâ€. Parker will assemble his touring band for a raft of newly-announced  pan-European and U.K. concerts  next year, starting April 4 at Super Bock Arena in Porto, Portugal and wrapping up May 13 at 3Arena in Dublin, Ireland. Heâ€™ll get matters underway next when, when The  Deadbeat Tour  kicks off its North America run with a show Oct. 27 at Brooklynâ€™s Barclays Center. Deadbeat drops half a decade after  The Slow Rush , from February 2020, a record that went to No. 1 on Australiaâ€™s ARIA Chart, and earned career peak positions on the Billboard 200 and Official U.K. Albums Chart UK, both at Noâ€¦

title: Ty Dolla $ign Shows Us Whoâ€™s Boss on â€˜Tycoonâ€™ Album: Stream ItÂ Now
summary: "It came from a Japanese word 'tycoon,' which means 'great lord.' Itâ€™s the same thing â€” great boss, the best at your craft," Ty Dolla $ign told Billboard in an interview about 'Tycoon.'
body: Ty Dolla $ign dropped his fourth studio album Tycoon on Friday (Oct. 17) via Atlantic Records. “A tycoon is a boss. It came from a Japanese word ‘tycoon,’ which means ‘great lord.’ Itâ€™s the same thing â€” great boss, the best at your craft. The top of your game, right?” he told Billboard in a new interview. “Thatâ€™s what I feel like Iâ€™ve reached. Thereâ€™s still heights I wanna reach, thereâ€™s still places I wanna go, thereâ€™s still more goals I have, but Iâ€™m there. Iâ€™m one of the biggest artists in the game.” He released three singles prior to the project: the Wayne Wonder -sampling “All In,” “Smile Body Pretty Face,” featuring Kodak Black and YG , and “Show Me Love,” featuring Tory Lanez . title: Sabrina Carpenter Confesses Her â€˜Greatest Fearâ€™ in â€˜SNLâ€™ Promos â€” And Itâ€™s Exactly the Same as Marcello Hernandezâ€™s
summary: This will mark the pop star's first time hosting, after performing on a 2024 episode & appearing on the SNL50 special.
body: This weekend, Sabrina Carpenter will return to the Saturday Night Live stage — but this time, she’ll be hosting. In new promos for her double duty as host and musical guest on Saturday’s show, Carpenter scoffs when castmember Marcello Hernandez asks if she’s “scared to host.” “Me? I perform in front of thousands of screaming fans every night,” Carpenter replies casually. Related Watch Sabrina Carpenter Channel (a Slightly More Delusional) Carrie Bradshaw in ‘SNL’ Promo We’ll Make This Short ‘n Sweet: Sabrina Carpenter Is Up for an Anthem Award How Dua Lipa, Chappell Roan & Sabrina Carpenter Are Maximizing Their Tours With Smart Pop Tactics “So youâ€™re not scared?” Hernandez asks, to which Carpenter responds, “No. Iâ€™m terrified . But not of hosting. Deep down, my greatest fear isâ€¦” At this point, Carpenter and Hernandez share their identical greatest fear in unison: ” …My dentist grows a really long beard and during the appointment it tickles my chest.” The pair look at each other stunned and just walk away. Elsewhere in the promos, Carpenter and Hernandez â€¦

title: Ace Frehleyâ€™s Biggest Billboard Hits, With KISS &Â Beyond
summary: Frehley rocked on the charts with smashes like "Rock and Roll All Nite (Live)," "Shout It Out Loud" & "New York Groove."
body: The late Ace Frehley ‘s history on the Billboard Hot 100 chart is stacked with iconic rock smashes like â€œBeth,â€ â€œRock and Roll All Nite (Live)â€ and â€œShout It Out Loud,” all from his work as a founding member of the rock band KISS , in addition to his own late 1970s solo smash “New York Groove.” After KISS formed in 1973 with Peter Criss, Frehley, Gene Simmons and Paul Stanley, the band would begin its Billboard chart takeover in April 1974, when its self-titled debut album hit the Billboard 200 , while the singleâ€™ â€œKissinâ€™ Timeâ€ arrived on the Hot 100 the following month. Related Ace Frehley, KISS Co-Founder & Guitar Hero, Dies at 74 Before Frehley departed KISS in the early 1980s, the band had racked up an impressive collection of hits on the Hot 100, including top 40-charting singles like “Rock and Roll All Nite (Live)” (a No. 12 hit in 1976), “Shout It Out Loud” (No. 31 in 1976), the ballad “Beth” (No. 7 in 1976), “Hard Luck Woman” (No. 15 in 1977) and the disco-flavored “I Was Made for Lovin’ You” (No. 11 in 1979). (Frehley would famously reunite with KISS in 1996 for a reunion tâ€¦

title: Temu: MF Doom Estateâ€™s â€˜Inflammatoryâ€™ Counterfeit Merch Lawsuit Has a â€˜Fundamental Problemâ€™
summary: The e-commerce giant claims itâ€™s just a hosting site for independent sellers.
body: Temu wants to dismiss a lawsuit over counterfeit MF Doom merchandise brought by the late hip-hop legendâ€™s estate, arguing in a new court filing that itâ€™s not responsible for the actions of independent Chinese sellers who use the e-commerce site. Gas Drawls LLC, which manages the estate of MF Doom (Daniel Dumile), filed suit in August, accusing Temu of selling dozens of knock-off t-shirts, hats, posters and other merchandise displaying the deceased rapperâ€™s name and signature mask. Temuâ€™s attorneys have now responded with a court filing that calls the case legally defective. Related MF Doom Estate Sues Temu for Selling Knock-Off Merch: ‘One of the Most Unethical Companies’ Solange Appointed First Scholar-in-Residence at USC Thornton School of Music Sia's Estranged Husband Wants $260,000 Per Month to Maintain 'Upper-Class Lifestyle' â€œGas Drawlsâ€™ complaint suffers from a fundamental problem: it fails to plead any plausible facts supporting its conclusory allegation that Temu â€” rather than independent third-party sellers â€” made, sold and shipped the allegedly infringing products,â€ write Temuâ€™s lawyers from the firm Knobbe Martens in the Thursday (Oct. 16) fiâ€¦

title: â€˜Godspeed, Aceâ€™: Ace Frehley Mourned by KISS Bandmate Gene Simmons, Bret Michaels, Tom Morello, Pearl Jam &Â More
summary: The rocker died at age 74 on Thursday.
body: Founding KISS guitarist Ace Frehley died Thursday (Oct. 16) at age 74 after sustaining injuries suffered during a fall last month. Frehleyâ€™s family issued a statement announcing the guitarist’s death, saying in part: â€œWe are completely devastated and heartbroken. In his last moments, we were fortunate enough to have been able to surround him with loving, caring, peaceful words, thoughts, prayers and intentions as he left this earth. … Reflecting on all of his incredible life achievements, Aceâ€™s memory will continue to live on forever!â€ Related Ace Frehley, KISS Co-Founder & Guitar Hero, Dies at 74 Ace Frehley of KISS Will Become Only the Third Person to Receive a Posthumous Kennedy Center Honor Usher Hopping on Remix of Chris Brown & Bryson Tiller's 'It Depends': Here's When It Arrives Frehley’s fellow rockers were also heartbroken when the news broke, coming out in droves on social media to share their love and condolences for the late musician and his family. The guitarist’s onetime KISS bandmate and fellow co-founder Gene Simmons posted on X, writing, “Our hearts are broken. Ace has passed on. No one can touch â€¦

title: Brooklyn Mirage Set for Demolition Following Avant GardnerÂ Bankruptcy
summary: According to public records, the 32,000 square-foot nightclub that became known as a prime venue for electronic acts will be torn down.
body: Brooklyn Mirage â€” the 32,000-square-foot open-air nightclub that has helped define Brooklynâ€™s nightlife since 2017 â€” is set to be torn down, according to new filings with New York Cityâ€™s Department of Buildings. Public records show that Avant Gardner LLC, the company behind the venue complex, submitted a permit application on Tuesday (Oct. 14) seeking approval to demolish the Mirage. The two other venues at the Avant Gardner complex, Kings Hall and the Great Hall, are set to remain open through December. Related Brooklyn Mirage Operator Avant Gardner Files For Voluntary Chapter 11 Bankruptcy: ‘The Most Viable Path Forward’ Solange Appointed First Scholar-in-Residence at USC Thornton School of Music Sia's Estranged Husband Wants $260,000 Per Month to Maintain 'Upper-Class Lifestyle' The filing lists a $1.5 million budget for the demolition project and names H&O Engineering as the contractor. It remains unclear when demolition will begin, but filings indicate the project will be a straightforward teardown. Opened in 2017, the Mirage quickly became one of the most coveted venues for touring DJs and electronic acts, earning recognition from DJ Mag aâ€¦

title: 'Dark days behind us' - Pickford signs new Everton deal
summary: England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford signs a new contract at Everton that will keep him at the club until the summer of 2029.

title: Draper & coach Trotman part ways after four years
summary: Jack Draper will no longer work with the man who coached him to the Indian Wells title as James Trotman wants to prioritise time with his family.

title: Muscat close to deal to become Rangers head coach
summary: Rangers are close to agreeing a deal to secure Shanghai Port's Kevin Muscat as their new head coach, but personal terms and other issues have still to be finalised.

title: Clarke v TKV on BBC moved to November after injury
summary: The British heavyweight title fight between Frazer Clarke and Jeamie TKV has been moved to 29 November after TKV suffered an injury.

title: LeBron, Ronaldo, Brady 'inspire' Djokovic to play into 40s
summary: Novak Djokovic wants to follow sporting greats such as LeBron James, Cristiano Ronaldo and Tom Brady by playing in his 40s and help shape the future of tennis.

title: Ex-UFC stars Silva & Weidman to box at Paul event

title: Grand Sumo event makes sensational return to London
summary: Sumo wrestling returns to London for the first time in over three decades, with a five-day Grand Tournament at the Royal Albert Hall in London.

summary: England are in big trouble as they lose their first six wickets for just 57 runs against Pakistan at the Women's Cricket World Cup.

title: 'Two brilliant deliveries' - Beaumont and Jones out early
summary: England's Tammy Beaumont and Amy Jones are bowled by Pakistan's Diana Baig and Fatima Sana in the second and third over respectively at the Cricket World Cup.

title: 'This is what 20 years of collecting shirts looks like'
summary: Doug Bierton, co-founder of Classic Football Shirts, speaks to BBC Sport's Nesta McGregor about his favourite shirts.

title: Football, fashion & the rise of the replica shirt
summary: How football shirts have evolved from one kit per club per season, with simple designs, to fashion statements.

title: How to go from backup quarterback to Super Bowl glory
summary: ESPN writer Seth Wickersham and Phoebe Schecter explain the thought processes behind the likes of legendary quarterback Tom Brady transforming themselves from backups to Super Bowl winners.

title: 'The learning curve was too much' - why Callahan was fired by Titans
summary: ESPN writer Seth Wickersham and Phoebe Schecter explain the reasons behind the firing of Tennessee Titans head coach Brian Callahan.

title: Humble & sweet, but a lion - the story of the first female Â£1m player
summary: Meet the person behind women's football's first Â£1m player, Arsenal's new superstar forward Olivia Smith.

title: 'People looked at me like I was a something, not someone'
summary: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.

title: 'He fixes what needs fixing' - why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach
summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

title: 'He has made young players dream' - the making of Liverpool icon Salah
summary: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.

title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US
summary: The story of Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in a sanctioned fight in the United States.

title: Louis Theroux is here, there and everywhere!
summary: Back-to-back Louis Theroux documentaries opening your eyes to the hidden lives around you
